items.title: Fear of the Lord
items.intention: I will fear the Lord and walk in wisdom today.
reviewQuestions: Where did I seek wisdom today?
Where did I rely on myself instead of God?

items.title: Stillness
items.intention: I will slow down and trust God today.
reviewQuestions: Did I practice stillness before reacting?

items.title: Present Yourself
items.intention: I offer my body to God in obedience today.

items.title: Endurance
items.intention: I will endure with faith and patience today.
reviewQuestions: How did God use difficulty for growth?

items.title: Guard the Heart
items.intention: I will guard my heart and thoughts today.
reviewQuestions: What should I guard against tomorrow?

items.title: Commitment
items.intention: I commit my work and rest to the Lord today.
reviewQuestions: Where did I resist trusting God?

items.title: Sabbath Rest
items.intention: I receive rest as a gift from God.
reviewQuestions: What did God show me in rest?

items.title: Integrity

evening.title: Evening Training — Push
evening.progressionCue: If last week felt steady, add one rep per set.

items.intention: I will act the same in private as in public.
reviewQuestions: Where did integrity require restraint today?

items.title: Mindset
items.intention: I will set my mind deliberately today.

items.title: Submission

evening.title: Evening Training — Pull
evening.progressionCue: Increase carry time before adding load.

items.intention: I submit my resistance, not my responsibility.

items.title: Steadiness

morning.title: Morning Discipline
items: Steady walk intervals — 25 minutes (3 minutes steady / 1 minute brisk)

evening.title: Evening Training — Conditioning & Core
items: Dead bug or hollow hold — 3×25–40 seconds
evening.progressionCue: Calm breathing matters more than speed.

items.intention: I will remain steady under pressure.

items.title: Correction

evening.title: Evening Training — Full Body
evening.progressionCue: Add one controlled rep if last session felt manageable.

items.intention: I will receive correction without defensiveness.
reviewQuestions: How did I respond to correction today?

items.title: Mastery
items.intention: I will not be mastered by impulse.
reviewQuestions: Where did restraint show up today?

items.title: Anchored (Sabbath)

evening.title: Evening Training
evening.progressionCue: No sugar after dinner | No phone use after 8:00 PM

items.intention: What disciplines felt most difficult this week? | Which felt lighter than expected? | What will I carry into next week?

items.title: Obedience

evening.title: Evening Training — Push
evening.progressionCue: Add one rep per set if all reps were clean last week.

items.intention: I will obey promptly, not selectively.
reviewQuestions: Where did obedience require restraint today?

items.title: Submission
items.intention: I will deny myself without resentment.
reviewQuestions: What desires did I bring under control today?

items.title: Contentment

evening.title: Evening Training — Pull
evening.progressionCue: Increase carry duration before adding weight.

items.intention: I will practice contentment today.

items.title: Control

morning.title: Morning Discipline
items: Steady walk intervals — 30 minutes (3 min steady / 1 min brisk)

evening.title: Evening Training — Conditioning & Core
items: Dead bug or hollow hold — 3×40–50 seconds

items.intention: I will govern my impulses deliberately.
reviewQuestions: What impulse did I restrain today?

items.title: Discipline

evening.title: Evening Training — Full Body
evening.progressionCue: Add one controlled rep where possible.

items.intention: I will accept discipline for long-term gain.
reviewQuestions: What did discipline cost me today?

items.title: Endurance
items.intention: I will endure without complaint.
reviewQuestions: Where did perseverance matter most today?

items.title: Grounded (Sabbath)

evening.title: Evening Training
evening.progressionCue: No sugar after dinner | No phone use after 8:00 PM

items.intention: What did restraint teach me this week? | Where did I grow most?

items.title: Silence
items.intention: I will create space to listen before speaking.
reviewQuestions: Where did silence reveal something today?
What did I feel compelled to avoid?

items.title: Listening
items.intention: I will listen fully before responding.
reviewQuestions: Where did I interrupt or assume?

items.title: Stillness
items.intention: I will wait without agitation today.

items.title: Restraint

morning.title: Morning Discipline
items: Steady walk intervals — 30 minutes (3 min steady / 1 min brisk)

evening.title: Evening Training — Conditioning & Core
items: Dead bug or hollow hold — 3×45–60 seconds

items.intention: I will restrain my words and reactions.
reviewQuestions: Where did restraint prevent harm today?

items.title: Trust
items.intention: I will trust without constant reassurance.
reviewQuestions: What did silence expose about my trust?

items.title: Preparation

evening.title: Evening Training — Optional Light Day
evening.progressionCue: Prepare for fast day; reduce intensity.

items.intention: I prepare my body and heart for fasting.
reviewQuestions: What attachments surfaced as I prepared?

items.title: Humility (Fast Day)

evening.title: Evening Practice
items: Fast continues through evening; prayer only
evening.progressionCue: No training today. Focus on prayer and rest.

items.intention: I humble myself intentionally before God.

items.title: Order

evening.title: Evening Training — Push
evening.progressionCue: Keep form precise; add reps only if order is maintained.

items.intention: I will bring order to my actions today.

items.title: Priority

evening.title: Evening Training — Legs
evening.progressionCue: Do not rush transitions between sets.

items.intention: I will seek first what matters most.
reviewQuestions: What competed for first place today?

items.title: Focus
items.intention: I will give full effort to the task at hand.
reviewQuestions: Where did distraction weaken my work?

items.title: Consistency

morning.title: Morning Discipline
items: Steady walk intervals — 30 minutes (3 min steady / 1 min brisk)

evening.title: Evening Training — Conditioning & Core
items: Dead bug or hollow hold — 3×45–60 seconds

items.intention: I will not grow weary in doing good.
reviewQuestions: What tempted me to skip or cut short today?

items.title: Stewardship
items.intention: I will steward time and strength faithfully.
reviewQuestions: What did I manage well today?

items.title: Preparation
items.intention: I prepare today so tomorrow can rest.

items.title: Sabbath Rest
items.intention: I receive rest as God’s design.

items.intention: I will apply strength with restraint today.

items.title: Measured Effort

items.title: Self-Control
items.intention: I will govern strength through self-control.
